thread.title: Paine laments Australian capitulation in third test amid ball-tampering scandal

title: Paine laments Australian capitulation in third test amid ball-tampering scandal
text:
Paine laments Australian capitulation in third test amid ball-tampering scandal 10:25am BST - 01:20 
Australia's stand-in captain Tim Paine says the enormity of the ball tampering scandal is sinking in with the team ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
